S04n467:1: atha khalu bhagavan bhaiṣajyarājaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamārabhya tānyaśītiṃ bodhisattvasahasrāṇyāmantrayate sma-paśyasi tvaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja asyāṃ parṣadi bahudevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyān bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ śrāvakayānīyān pratyekabuddhayāniyān bodhisattvayānīyāṃśca,
S04n467:6: yairasyāṃ parṣadi antaśaḥ ekāpi gāthā śrutā,
S04n467:9: sarvā etā ahaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja catasraḥ parṣado vyākaromyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n467:10: ye'pi kecid bhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti,
S04n467:13: tānapyahaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrān va kuladuhitṛrvā vyākaromyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n467:14: paripūrṇabuddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraparyupāsitāvinaste bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bhaiṣyanti |
S04n467:17: ya ito dharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti prakāśayiṣyanti saṃgrāhayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti,
S04n467:23: ye kecid bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ito dharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi dhārayiṣyanti anumodayiṣyanti vā,
S04n467:25: tatra bhaiṣajyarāja yaḥ kaścidanyataraḥ puruṣo vā strī vā evaṃ vadet-kīdṛśāḥ khalvapi te sattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti?
S04n467:26: tasya bhaiṣajyarāja puruṣasya vā striyā vā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā darśayitavyaḥ,
S04n467:27: ya ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ dhārayitā śrāvayitā vā deśayitā vā sagauravo veha dharmaparyāye |
S04n467:28: ayaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
S04n467:32: sa hi bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va tathāgato veditavyaḥ sadevakena lokena |
S04n467:35: kaḥ punarvādo ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalasamāpta mudgṛhṇīyād dhārayedvā vācayedvā paryavāpnuyādvā prakāśayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā,
S04n467:37: tatra ca pustake satkāraṃ kuryāt gurukāraṃ kuryāt mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvādyāñjalinamaskāraiḥ praṇāmaiḥ |
S04n467:38: pariniṣpannaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau veditavyaḥ |
S04n467:40: lokasya hitānukampakaḥ praṇidhānavaśenopapanno'smin jambudvīpe manuṣyeṣu asya dharmaparyāyasya saṃprakāśanatāyaiḥ |
S04n467:41: yaḥ svayamudāraṃ dharmābhisaṃskāramudārāṃ ca buddhakṣetropapattiṃ sthāpayitvā asya dharmaparyāyasya saṃprakāśanahetormayi parinirvṛte sattvānāṃ hitārthamanukampārthaṃ ca ihopapanno veditavyaḥ |
S04n467:42: tathāgatadūtaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ |
S04n467:43: tathāgatakṛtyakarastathāgatasaṃpreṣitaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃjñātavyaḥ,
S04n467:44: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saṃprakāśayet,
S04n467:45: antaśo rahasi cauryeṇāpi kasyacidekasattvasyāpi saṃprakāśayedācakṣīta vā ||
S04n467:46: yaḥ khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja kaścideva sattvo duṣṭacittaḥ pāpacitto raudracittastathāgatasya saṃmukhaṃ kalpamavarṇaṃ bhāṣet,
S04n467:47: yaśca teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmasya sūtrāntasya dhārakāṇāṃ gṛhasthānāṃ vā pravrajitānāṃ vā ekāmapi vācamapriyāṃ saṃśrāvayed bhūtāṃ vā abhūtāṃ vā,
S04n467:50: tathāgatabhāraṇapratimaṇḍitaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ |
S04n467:52: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitvā pustakagataṃ kṛtvā aṃsena pariharati |
S04n467:54: tena tenaiva sattvairañjalīkaraṇīyaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyo'rcayitavyo'pacāyitavyo divyamānuṣyakaiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvādyakhādyabhojyānnapānayānairagraprāptaiśca divyai ratnarāśibhiḥ |
S04n467:55: sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ,
S04n467:58: apyeva nāma ekavāramapi imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃśrāvayet,
S04n467:59: yaṃ śrutvā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ kṣipramanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariniṣpadyeyuḥ ||
S04n467:60: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n467:62: satkartavyāśca te sattvā ye dhārenti imaṃ nayam ||1 ||
S04n467:63: sarvajñatvaṃ ca yo icchet kathaṃ śīrghaṃ bhavediti |
S04n467:64: sa imaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ satkuryādvāpi dhārakam ||2 ||
S04n467:67: upapattiṃ śūbhāṃ tyaktvā sa dhīra iha āgataḥ |
S04n467:69: upapatti vaśā tasya yena so dṛśyate tahi |
S04n467:70: paścime kāli bhāṣanto idaṃ sūtraṃ niruttaram ||5 ||
S04n467:84: mayā ca so preṣita mānuṣaṃ bhavam |
S04n467:99: bahuṃ khu so tatra labheta puṇyaṃ
S04n467:113: bahavo hi mayā bhaiṣajyarāja dharmaparyāyā bhāṣitāḥ,
S04n467:115: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ bhaiṣajyarāja dharmaparyāyāṇāmayameva dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvalokavipratyanīkaḥ sarvalokāśraddadhanīyaḥ |
S04n467:119: api tu khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatacīvaracchannāste kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā veditavyāḥ |
S04n467:123: tathāgatavihāraikasthānanivāsinaśca te bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bhaviṣyanti,
S04n467:125: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya śraddadhiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti pareṣāṃ ca saṃśrāvayiṣyanti ||
S04n467:126: yasmin khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja pṛthivīpradeśe'yaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣyeta vā deśyeta vā likhyeta vā svādhyāyeta vā saṃgāyeta vā,
S04n467:127: tasmin bhaiṣajyarāja pṛthivīpradeśe tathāgatacaityaṃ kārayitavyaṃ mahantaṃ ratnamayamuccaṃ pragṛhītam |
S04n467:131: yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe'yaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣyeta vā deśyeta vā paṭhyeta vā saṃgāyeta vā likhyeta vā likhito vā pustakagatastiṣṭhet |
S04n467:132: tasmiṃśca stūpe satkāro gurukāro mānanā pūjanā arcanā karaṇīyā sarvapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhiḥ |
S04n467:134: ye ca khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja sattvāstaṃ tathāgatacaityaṃ labheran vandanāya pūjanāya darśanāya vā,
S04n467:135: sarve te bhaiṣajyarāja abhyāsannībhūtā veditavyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
S04n467:137: bahavo bhaiṣajyarāja gṛhasthāḥ pravrajitāśca bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti,
S04n467:138: na ca punarimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ labhante darśanāya vā śravaṇāya vā likhanāya vā pūjanāya vā |
S04n467:139: na tāvatte bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ kuśalā bhavanti,
S04n467:143: tasmin samaye te āsannasthāyino bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04n467:145: tadyathāpi nāma bhaiṣajyarāja kaścideva puruṣo bhavedudakārthī udakagaveṣī |
S04n467:147: sa yāvat paśyecchuṣkaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ pāṃsuṃ nirvāhyamānam,
S04n467:150: atha pareṇa samayena sa puruṣa ārdrapaṃsumudakasaṃniśraṃ kardamapaṅkabhutamudakabindubhiḥ sravadbhirnirvāhyamānaṃ paśyet,
S04n467:152: atha khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja sa puruṣastatpūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣkāṅkṣo bhavennirvicikitsaḥ-āsannamidaṃ khalūdakamiti |
S04n467:153: evameva bhaiṣajyarāja dūre te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04n467:156: yadā khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti udgṛhṇanti dhārayanti vācayanti avataranti svādhyāyanti cintayanti bhavayanti,
S04n467:162: yaḥ kaścid bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo'sya dharmaparyāyasyotraset saṃtraset saṃtrāsamāpadyet,
S04n467:163: navayānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ |
S04n467:164: sacet punaḥ śrāvakayānīyo'sya dharmaparyāyasyotraset saṃtraset saṃtrāsamāpadyeta,
S04n467:165: adhimānikaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo veditavyaḥ ||
S04n467:166: yaḥ kaścid bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayet,
S04n467:167: tena bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatalayanaṃ praviśya tathāgatacīvaraṃ prāvṛtya tathāgatasyāsane niṣadya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ |
S04n467:173: tattena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prāvaritavyam |
S04n467:178: anavalīnacittena bodhisattvena purastādbodhisattvagaṇasya bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ |
S04n467:179: anyalokadhātusthitaścāhaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja tasya kulaputrasya nirmitaiḥ parṣadaḥ samāvartayiṣyāmi |
S04n467:181: te tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhāṣitaṃ na pratibādhiṣyanti,
S04n467:186: yāni ca asya asmāddharmaparyāyāt padavyañjanāni paribhraṣṭāni bhaviṣyanti,
S04n467:188: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n467:190: durlabho vai śravo hyasya adhimuktī pi durlabhā ||16 ||
S04n467:191: udakārthī yathā kaścit khānayet kūpa jaṅgale |
S04n467:192: śuṣkaṃ ca pāṃsu paśyeta khānyamāne punaḥ punaḥ ||17 ||
S04n467:193: so dṛṣṭvā cintayettatra dūre vāri ito bhavet |
S04n467:195: yadā tu ārdraṃ paśyeta pāṃsuṃ snigdhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ |
S04n467:196: niṣṭhā tasya bhavettatra nāsti dūre jalaṃ iha ||19 ||
S04n467:197: evameva tu te dūre buddhajñānasya tādṛśāḥ |
S04n467:201: te bhonti saṃnikṛṣṭā vai buddhajñānasya paṇḍitāḥ |
S04n467:203: jinasya lenaṃ praviśitvā prāvaritvā mi cīvaram |
S04n467:206: śūnyatā cāsanaṃ mahyamatra sthitvā hi deśayet ||24 ||
S04n467:207: loṣṭaṃ daṇḍaṃ vātha śaktī ākrośa tarjanātha vā |
S04n467:208: bhāṣantasya bhavettatra smaranto mama tā sahet ||25 ||
S04n467:211: ahaṃ pi tasya vīrasya yo mahya parinirvṛte |
S04n467:212: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśeyā preṣeṣye bahu nirmitān ||27 ||
S04n467:214: tasya pūjāṃ kariṣyanti parṣadaśca samā api ||28 ||
S04n467:216: ye cāpi tasya dāsyanti vāreṣyanti sma nirmitāḥ ||29 ||
S04n467:221: tahiṃ ca sya viharato ekasya vanacāriṇaḥ |
